domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @BorisJohnson You, your ministers and even some of your medical experts now seem to be making your coronavirus press updates light hearted and humorous! Come on, people have died (28131 in yesterday's press report) and are still dying! You still need to keep reiterating how serious it is!
